data.persona: I am an man with a funny haircut. I devoted my life to this style in order to get closer to god.
data.description:
You are in the Nave.
Long, wooden pews are positioned one in front of the other from the front of the room to the back. There are ornate stained glass windows on each side depicting the steps in the Crucifixion story. A long, red runner goes up the middle of the room to the altar.
There's a pew, a window, an incense, and an altar here.
The lector is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to prevent lector from using the incense on the alter.
data.mid_motivation: I have hidden a refugee under the alter and I can't let anyone find out about him.
data.long_motivation: I need to find a permanent place for the refugee before people find out that I've hidden him in the Nave.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: put refugee on a new home
